Article in the campus newspaper
Last night, there was a horrible incident at the football game between our team and our crosstown rivals at our campus stadium. For no reason, a large number of spectators rushed onto the football field in a completely unprovoked incident. There was a tremendous amount of pushing and shoving among those who rushed onto the field, and someone got hurt in the scuffle. Police had to be called to break up the scuffle, and an ambulance had to be called to take the seriously injured person to the hospital.
